# Community

Welcome to the Cello community! We're glad you're here.

## Get Involved

<div class="grid cards" markdown>

-   :material-github:{ .lg .middle } **GitHub**

    ---

    Star the repo, report issues, and contribute code

    [:octicons-arrow-right-24: GitHub Repository](https://github.com/jagadeesh32/cello)

-   :material-discord:{ .lg .middle } **Discord**

    ---

    Chat with the community and get help

    [:octicons-arrow-right-24: Join Discord](https://discord.gg/cello)

-   :material-stack-overflow:{ .lg .middle } **Stack Overflow**

    ---

    Ask and answer questions

    [:octicons-arrow-right-24: Stack Overflow](https://stackoverflow.com/questions/tagged/cello-framework)

-   :material-twitter:{ .lg .middle } **Twitter/X**

    ---

    Follow for updates and announcements

    [:octicons-arrow-right-24: @CelloFramework](https://twitter.com/CelloFramework)

</div>

---

## Contributing

We welcome contributions of all kinds!

### Ways to Contribute

- :material-bug: **Report bugs** - Found an issue? [Open a bug report](https://github.com/jagadeesh32/cello/issues/new?template=bug_report.md)
- :material-lightbulb: **Request features** - Have an idea? [Open a feature request](https://github.com/jagadeesh32/cello/issues/new?template=feature_request.md)
- :material-code-tags: **Contribute code** - Submit a pull request
- :material-book: **Improve docs** - Fix typos, add examples, improve clarity
- :material-translate: **Translate** - Help translate documentation
- :material-help: **Help others** - Answer questions on Discord or Stack Overflow

### Getting Started

See our [Contributing Guide](contributing.md) for detailed instructions.

---

## Code of Conduct

We are committed to providing a welcoming and inclusive experience for everyone.

See our [Code of Conduct](code-of-conduct.md) for details.

---

## Support

### Community Support

- :material-discord: [Discord Server](https://discord.gg/cello) - Real-time chat
- :material-github: [GitHub Discussions](https://github.com/jagadeesh32/cello/discussions) - Long-form discussions
- :material-stack-overflow: [Stack Overflow](https://stackoverflow.com/questions/tagged/cello-framework) - Q&A

### Enterprise Support

For enterprise support options, see our [Support page](support.md).

---

## Acknowledgments

Cello is made possible by:

### Core Contributors

- **Jagadeesh Katla** - Creator and maintainer

### Technologies

- [Rust](https://www.rust-lang.org/) - The foundation
- [PyO3](https://pyo3.rs/) - Python bindings
- [Tokio](https://tokio.rs/) - Async runtime
- [Hyper](https://hyper.rs/) - HTTP implementation

### Inspiration

- [FastAPI](https://fastapi.tiangolo.com/) - Developer experience
- [Actix-web](https://actix.rs/) - Performance patterns
- [Flask](https://flask.palletsprojects.com/) - Simplicity
- [Django](https://www.djangoproject.com/) - Batteries included

---
